name: Quran Verse Inserter
author: Shams Hasan

sections.description:
If you are looking for inserting a single verse into your blog post, then this plugin is for you. With this Gutenberg block, you can easily insert any verse from the Quran with its translation. The Arabic text featured in this plugin is sourced from the Quran Uthmani Text, provided by the Quran Academy.

There is about 100+ translation available. You can choose any translation in your preferred language.

This plugin is relying on a 3rd party as a service to get verses from the Quran and showing translations. Here is the link to the service https://alquran.cloud/ and their Terms and Conditions

If you want to make it even more personalized, feel free to drop me an email at shamscsediu@gmail.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/qvi-quran-verse-inserter directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin ‘Quran Verse Inserter’ through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Why this plugin?

This plugin is created to help people easily insert quran ayat to their post.

Verses not showing on block, What to do?

If you don’t see any verse loaded on the block then try to reload the page and try again.

  • Release

short_description: Easily insert Quran verse to your post
description:
If you are looking for inserting a single verse into your blog post, then this plugin is for you. With this Gutenberg block, you can easily insert any verse from the Quran with its translation. The Arabic text featured in this plugin is sourced from the Quran Uthmani Text, provided by the Quran Academy.

There is about 100+ translation available. You can choose any translation in your preferred language.

This plugin is relying on a 3rd party as a service to get verses from the Quran and showing translations. Here is the link to the service https://alquran.cloud/ and their Terms and Conditions

screenshots.caption: Goto "posts" > "add new" and then select the block from "Text > Quran Verse Inserter"
Choose surah, verse and translation from the right sidebar menu and then click "Get verse".If you don't see the sidebar menu open then click setting icon from upper right.
You can choose any translation from the 100+ different translations
